notes:
It's the [[Carniphila]]'s boss. It looks and behaves like a [[Carniphila]], but it is much stronger.
<gallery captionalign="left" mode="nolines">
Tiquandas revenge gallery.jpg|[[Paladin]] killing the [[Carniphila]]'s boss with [[Sudden Death]] runes, while [[Knight]] blocks.
Tiquandas Revenge Special Task.jpg|[[Knight]] killing Tiquandas Revenge; as a reward from special task on [[Antica]].
</gallery>
name: Tiquandas Revenge
location:
Deep in the [[Tiquanda|Tiquandian]] Jungle, has been seen {{Mapper Coords|128.147|127.45|7|3|text=here}}, {{Mapper Coords|128.157|127.191|7|8|text=here}} and [http://tibia.wikia.com/wiki/Mapper?coords=128.76,128.16,7 here].
The portal to the boss for the [[Killing in the Name of... Quest|special task]] is located {{Mapper Coords|128.104|127.70|7|3|text=here}}.
strategy: If you are a '''[[Mage]]''', it would definitely be smart to use [[Sudden Death|Sudden Death Runes]] to kill this. You wouldn't want it to get close to you. The blocker (if there's any) should run it and absorb its distance attacks but not let it come to [[Melee]]. If you are a '''[[Knight]]''' the only and best strategy is to use best weapon and [[Fierce Berserk]]. If you are a '''[[Paladin]]''' use [[Assassin Star]]s if possible. Its [[Self Healing|Healing]] is extremely fast, much more than [[Hydra]]. This is not a regular spawn.
